elements: Study the correspondences of two matching Edge influences to intensify them. Study how it's affected by Winter influence to subvert it, instead.
I must understand the influences at work, if I am to strengthen or to subvert them. [You'll need a significant grounding in the relevant lore.]
感知变得敏锐了。[一种二阶影响：对于有洞察力的学徒来说很明显，立刻能被辨别出来。可用于在某些仪式中召唤手下。]
Study the correspondences of two matching Edge influences to intensify them. Study how it's affected by Winter influence to subvert it, instead.
